name: A Causual Dungeon Game
description:
A simple demo made by unity. And I made it for fun instead of trying to creat a masterpiece.

Pixel arts assets from: https://runninblood.itch.io/asset-pack

Any feedback is appreciated.

Use arrow keys to move; Z to jump; X, C to attack.

Q, W to damage or heal yourself.

version 0.01: nothing interesting at all.
